name: qdPM
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: qdPM is a free web-based project management tool suitable for a small team working on multiple projects.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:Copyright @ (20[\d]{2}) <a class="footer-text" target="_blank"( title="open source project management software")? href="http:\/\/(www\.qds-team\.com|qdpm\.net\/)">)
